text: Zisas mba bunin mbe nzua vov khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde fhum nden nzɨgi nde suaŋgi buni nde nta ndigi, mba buni khaŋ nzuai, ‘Nde harigi gumgi gu mbigi shogɨrim, mbe vhɨzɨ thari. Guma the maaŋ muuŋgip harigi guma the shogirim, ana rimgirga, mba guma ana bigi ndi thɨgar mbai guman pana nɨma thɨgɨrga.’
